docs.title: About me
docs.text:

I hold a BSc in Physics and have a professional background in industrial automation.

Then I took up Data Science.

I did most of my training on DataCamp.

Where I got these certifications(1)

  1. AI Engineer for Data Scientists Data Engineer Associate Data Scientist Associate

While completing +100 courses(1)

docs.title: Udalmap API wrapper
docs.text:

subject tasks Python package OOP, DevOps, PyPI Code testing Unit testing, CI with GitHub Actions Documentation Sphinx (automatic with docstrings)
